description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Cagliari vs Monza in the Serie A
title: Cagliari vs Monza: Serie A stats & head-to-head
title_page: Cagliari vs Monza: Serie A stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goal!
Goal! Cagliari 3, Monza 0. Zito Luvumbo (Cagliari) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gianluca Gaetano with a through ball following a fast break.
Post
Leonardo Pavoletti (Cagliari) hits the bar with a header from the left side of the six yard box. Assisted by Gianluca Gaetano with a cross following a corner.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Gianluca Caprari (Monza) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Danilo D'Ambrosio.
Post
Attempt missed. Leonardo Pavoletti (Cagliari) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right.
Post
Attempt saved. Gianluca Gaetano (Cagliari) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Michel Adopo.
